document_data.name: Xandra Shobalar
document_data.mainbody: '''Xandra Shobalar''' was a [[drow]] of [[House Shobalar]] and the third daughter of [[Hinkutes'nat Alar Shobalar]]. She was the house's Mistress of Magic, tasked with training others in the house about wizardry. She trained the young [[Liriel Baenre]].
document_data.Relatives: Xandra's mother was [[Hinkutes'nat Alar Shobalar]] and she had ten sisters. Five of these sisters were [[wizard]]s.
document_data.History: Xandra became deeply envious of Liriel's magical ability and plotted to kill her, travelling to [[Mantol-Derith]] in order to buy an enslaved wizard, [[Tresk Mulander]], to pit against her in the [[Blooding]].

Appearances.Novels and short stories: * "[[Rite of Blood]]" in ''[[The Best of the Realms]]'' and ''[[Realms of the Underdark]]''
